data.title: 输出什么?
data.options: {"options":["{ email: \"my@email.com\", address: null }","{ email: \"my@email.com\" }","{ email: \"my@email.com\", address: {} }","{ email: \"my@email.com\", address: undefined }"],"isMulti":false,"answer":[2]}
data.explanation: `address` 的默认值是一个空对象 `{}`。当我们设置 `member` 变量为 `createMember` 函数返回的对象，我们没有为address参数传值，意味着address的值为默认的空对象 `{}`。一个空对象是一个truthy值，意味着 `address ? address : null` 条件会返回 `true`。address的值为空对象 `{}`。
